title: Record-breaking Solana USDC volume signals growing stablecoin dominance
description:
Solana-based USD Coin (USDC) transaction volume surpassed that of USDT on the Tron blockchain, according to data from blockchain intelligence platform  Artemis. Data from the platform shows that Solana USDC transfer volume reached more than $60 billion on Jan. 1, while that of Tron USDT was around $34 billion. This continues a trend observed in […]

The post Record-breaking Solana USDC volume signals growing stablecoin dominance appeared first on CryptoSlate.

title: Bitcoin largest one-day plunge in nearly a month liquidated over $700 million
description:
Quick Take Bitcoin’s performance on Jan. 3 marked a significant downturn as it experienced its largest one-day drop since Dec. 11, a decrease of 4.7%. In the last twelve months, only five instances exhibited a greater one-day drop. This decline triggered over $700 million of liquidations within a 24-hour window, with Bitcoin’s share amounting to […]

The post Bitcoin largest one-day plunge in nearly a month liquidated over $700 million appeared first on CryptoSlate.

title: UBS Forecasts Unprecedented Surge in AI Industry, Predicts 15-Fold Surge in Revenue
description: The Artificial Intelligence (AI) sector is on the brink of a remarkable expansion, with UBS predicting a market value of $225 billion by 2027. title: Weapon Balancing Update Coming to Warzone Season 1
description: Raven Software, the developers behind the popular battle royale game Call of Duty: Warzone, have announced plans for an upcoming weapon balancing update in Warzone Season 1. In response to player feedback and concerns about game balance, the MTZ Interceptor, a Marksman Rifle, is set to receive a nerf in this anticipated update.  This move […]

title: Dominant Champion Combos in League of Legends’ Arena Game Mode
description: In the frenetic battlegrounds of League of Legends Arena game mode, summoners seek the perfect champion synergy to dominate their foes. One combination that stands out is Veigar and Trundle. Veigar, a mage with unparalleled burst potential, finds balance with Trundle’s tankiness. title: Microsoft Introduces ‘Copilot Key’ for Seamless AI Integration in Windows 11 PCs
description: In a significant move toward personal and intelligent computing, Microsoft has announced the inclusion of a “Copilot key” on Windows 11 PC keyboards. This innovative addition allows users to access Copilot’s AI-powered tools effortlessly with a single press. Copilot, which leverages the power of OpenAI’s latest large language models and data from Microsoft 365 apps, […]

title: Xbox & FM24 Offer Gamers a Pro Gig
description: Xbox and Sega-owned game Football Manager 24 have joined forces to offer gamers a unique opportunity to enter the world of professional football. title: Citigroup alumni to offer BTC securities without SEC’s approval
description: Former executives of Citigroup Inc. will offer Bitcoin (BTC)-backed securities. According to a Bloomberg report published on Jan. 4 former Citigroup executives will offer BTC-backed securities that they say do not need approval from US regulators. The brazen move will…

title: Ark Invest Coinbase Shares Offload Continues; Sells Shares Worth $25M
description:
Cathie Wood’s Ark Invest Coinbase stock-selling spree has spilled over into the new year after the firm reportedly reduced its portfolio on Wednesday.  The investment management firm reportedly sold another 166,183 Coinbase Global Inc. shares worth around $25.3 million. Reports noted that the stocks were offloaded from two of the firm’s exchange-traded funds (ETFs). In […]
